short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Craft user stories by only writing business requirements and allowing AI to do the rest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Agile Craft is the next generation in how to write user stories. Simply write your business requirements down in a text block, such as Jira, Confluence, or Trello and have Agile Craft transform that into fully formatted user stories for exactly what you need. 

This will speed up your user story writing and allow you to focus on what really matters, the requirements you have! 

If you're in a business or a consultant running a project, this is the perfect extension for you.
